title: Vendor (Company) process - Business rules
content:
In the out-of-the-box Vendor (Company) workflow, the following business rules apply to the indicated metaphase or phase.

Normal process - all phases

Event Condition Service Management action
Rendering forms Id = Active Caution note = hidden

Caution phase

Event Condition Action
After change None Caution note = mandatory

Related topics

  • Company Management
  • Company workflow
  • How to create a company record
  • How to edit a company record
